Help make Artemis better.

Join our open, friendly community and help make Artemis the people's desktop environment! Whether you are a developer, translator, or designer, there's some way you can contribute to such an amazing project.



Got some code?

Our code resides in the wonderful community home of GitHub. Make pull requests, file issues, and contribute to the source code of the Artemis project with a free, online service that works with Git!

Go to GitHub



Want to chat a bit?

The Artemis community communicates through the open, private platform Telegram. Joining our group is extremely easy and the app is available for all mahor platforms, including Linux.

Join Telegram Group



Want to discusss even further?

The Artemis community communicates in a deeper scale with Discord, a popular chat application for Windows, Mac, and Linux. If you have a Discord account, joining our server is extremely easy with that button down below.

Join Discord Server
